attributes.action: allow all former and current Gurkas to take up british citizenship and reside in the uk after 4 years service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We request that the Primeminister, as a matter of urgency, changes the rules to allow these brave soldiers to take up residence in this country, together with their immediate family should they so choose.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
